SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.ClientClass

Interface ClientMarket

All Known Implementing Classes:
Market
public interface ClientMarket
The ClientMarket interface provides methods for accessing the market data, therefore face-up cards, resource deck, gold deck, and common objectives.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<ObjectiveCard>
    getCommonObjectives()
    Gets the list of common ObjectiveCards in the market.
    ResourceCard[]
    getFaceUp(boolean isGold)
    Gets the face-up ResourceCards/GoldCard in the market
    ArrayList<GoldCard>
    getGoldDeck()
    Gets the deck of GoldCards in the market.
    ArrayList<ResourceCard>
    getResourceDeck()
    Gets the deck of ResourceCards in the market.

  • Method Details

    • getFaceUp

      ResourceCard[] getFaceUp(boolean isGold)
      Gets the face-up ResourceCards/GoldCard in the market
      Parameters:
      isGold - if true, returns GoldCard, otherwise returns ResourceCards.
      Returns:
      an array of ResourceCards that are face-up in the market.

    • getResourceDeck

      ArrayList<ResourceCard> getResourceDeck()
      Gets the deck of ResourceCards in the market.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ResourceCards representing the resource deck.

    • getGoldDeck

      ArrayList<GoldCard> getGoldDeck()
      Gets the deck of GoldCards in the market.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of GoldCards representing the gold deck.

    • getCommonObjectives

      ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> getCommonObjectives()
      Gets the list of common ObjectiveCards in the market.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ObjectiveCards representing the common objectives.
